definition: a correctional institution used to detain persons who are in the lawful custody of the government (either accused persons awaiting trial or convicted persons serving a sentence), lock up or confine, in or as in a jail
details:
noun
- a correctional institution used to detain persons who are in the lawful custody of the government (either accused persons awaiting trial or convicted persons serving a sentence)
= synonyms: pokey
verb
- lock up or confine, in or as in a jail
= synonyms: remand
